description: This is an all season hike/walk along the Richmond Dyke from the Canada Line Aberdeen station.  It is an out and back hike with an abundance of wildlife, along with a relatively flat route.
directions: Take the Canada Line in Vanacouverto Aberdeen Station then walk west toward dyke and look for large metallic silver teardrop that marks the start of the dyke trail for this hike.
title: Richmond West Dyke
